title: System Fault
likely_causes: ECM communication error|Sensor fault|Wiring harness issue

title: Engine Overheat
meaning: Engine temperature exceeding safe operating limits
likely_causes: Low coolant level|Blocked radiator|Cooling fan failure
checks: Check coolant level|Clean radiator fins|Test cooling fan

title: Hydraulic System Fault
meaning: Hydraulic system error or low pressure
checks: Check fluid level|Replace hydraulic filter|Inspect pump
